name: NeuroDash
signal_source: ADHD community feedback: 'Every productivity app assumes I can stick to rigid systems when my brain doesn't work that way'
description: Adaptive productivity companion that adjusts to executive function fluctuations and energy levels throughout the day
target_user: Adults with ADHD, autism, or other neurodivergent conditions seeking flexible productivity support
pain_point_evidence: Neurodivergent users abandoning productivity apps within weeks due to inflexible structure requirements
differentiation: First productivity app designed specifically for fluctuating executive function rather than neurotypical consistency
subscription_fit: Premium features for advanced pattern recognition, personalized coaching, and integration with health data

pricing.trial_strategy: 21-day trial to capture full weekly pattern variations
